column2: Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam: A New Translation - Heir to the Stars

Digitally remastered compilation movies for the Zeta Gundam TV series with some new footage. Part of Gundam's 25th Anniversary celebration. 

(Source: AniDB)

['Kidou Senshi Z Gundam: Hoshi wo Tsugumono', 'Mobile Suit Gundam', 'Mobile Suit Gundam 0083: Stardust Memory', 'Mobile Suit Gundam III: Encounters in Space', 'Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam', 'Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam: A New Translation II - Lovers']
